item.title: Chinese Stocks Power Ahead of Emerging Peers Amid AI Frenzy
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Gains in Chinese stocks have typically filtered through to bolster their emerging-market counterparts â€” not this time. Mainland equities have surged over the past six months, breaking free of a multi-year slump, while broader developing-nation equities have largely flat-lined. The div...
